page.content: At Tredustan Hall, the mean temp- erature of the coldest month (January) is 3 degrees Celsius and that for the warmest month (August) is 15 degrees. These temperatures may be compared with the temperatures recorded in the adjacent area on Fan Frynych which have been described under GR 02929222 as MOUNTAIN TEMPERATURES. Because Tredustan Hall is lower than Pont Blaen-Cwm ddu, the average temperat- ures are about one half degree warmer. The highest temperature recorded at Tredustan Hall was 29 degrees C on 8th July 1984. The coldest was the remarkable -20.0 degrees Celsius on 14th January 1982.
